# *
User-agent: *
Allow: /

# test-bot
User-agent: test-bot
Allow: /colophon
Allow: /contact

# baiduspider
User-agent: baiduspider
Disallow: /colophon
Disallow: /contact

# Host
Host: http://localhost:3000

# Sitemaps
Sitemap: http://localhost:3000/sitemap.xml
Sitemap: http://localhost:3000/server-sitemap.xml
